channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- openshift
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- openshift

item.title: CVE-2019-14845|2024-08-05T00:26:39.114Z -- red%20hat -- openshift
item.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenShift builds, versions 4.1 up to 4.3. Builds that extract source from a container image, bypass the TLS hostname verification. An attacker can take advantage of this flaw by launching a man-in-the-middle attack and injecting malicious content.
